law.catch_line: The Treasurer shall maintain all securities other than physical securities with:...
law.text:
The Treasurer shall maintain all securities other than physical securities with:
any institution incorporated under the laws of the State as a State bank, trust company, or savings bank;
any national banking association that has its principal office in the State; or
any trust company, as defined in § 1-101 of the Estates and Trusts Article.
